00298 #define UA_SERVER_SETNODEATTRIBUTE_DECL(ATTRIBUTE, ATTRIBUTEID, TYPE, TYPEINDEX)    \
00299     static UA_INLINE UA_StatusCode UA_Server_setNodeAttribute_##ATTRIBUTE(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId nodeId, const TYPE *value) { \
00300       return UA_Server_setNodeAttribute(server, nodeId, ATTRIBUTEID, &UA_TYPES[TYPEINDEX], value); \
00301   }

00304 // UA_SERVER_SETNODEATTRIBUTE_DECL(nodeClass, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_NODECLASS, UA_NodeClass, UA_TYPES_NODECLASS) // not supported

00309 UA_SERVER_SETNODEATTRIBUTE_DECL(userWriteMask, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_USERWRITEMASK, UA_UInt32, UA_TYPES_UINT32)
00310 UA_SERVER_SETNODEATTRIBUTE_DECL(isAbstract, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_ISABSTRACT, UA_Boolean, UA_TYPES_BOOLEAN)
00311 UA_SERVER_SETNODEATTRIBUTE_DECL(symmetric, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_SYMMETRIC, UA_Boolean, UA_TYPES_BOOLEAN)
00312 UA_SERVER_SETNODEATTRIBUTE_DECL(inverseName, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_INVERSENAME, UA_LocalizedText, UA_TYPES_LOCALIZEDTEXT)
00313 UA_SERVER_SETNODEATTRIBUTE_DECL(containsNoLoops, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_CONTAINSNOLOOPS, UA_Boolean, UA_TYPES_BOOLEAN)

00316 // UA_SERVER_SETNODEATTRIBUTE_DECL(dataType, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_DATATYPE, UA_NodeId, UA_TYPES_NODEID) // not supported. set via the value variant.
00317 // UA_SERVER_SETNODEATTRIBUTE_DECL(valueRank, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_VALUERANK, UA_Int32, UA_TYPES_INT32) // not supported. set via the value variant.
00318 // UA_SERVER_SETNODEATTRIBUTE_DECL(arrayDimensions, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_ARRAYDIMENSIONS, UA_Int32, UA_TYPES_INT32) // not supported. set via the value variant.

00408 typedef struct {
00409     enum {
00410         UA_JOBTYPE_NOTHING,
00411         UA_JOBTYPE_DETACHCONNECTION,
00412         UA_JOBTYPE_BINARYMESSAGE,
00413         UA_JOBTYPE_METHODCALL,
00414         UA_JOBTYPE_DELAYEDMETHODCALL,
00415     } type;
00416     union {
00417         UA_Connection *closeConnection;
00418         struct {
00419             UA_Connection *connection;
00420             UA_ByteString message;
00421         } binaryMessage;
00422         struct {
00423             void *data;
00424             void (*method)(UA_Server *server, void *data);
00425         } methodCall;
00426     } job;
00427 } UA_Job;
00428
